nodes.text: 'Imperial Death warrant's were Imperially sanctioned death sentences that were acted upon by bounty hunters, Imperial Assassins, and other Imperial agents.
In 0 ABY, Stormtroopers on The Wheel tried to enact an Imperial death warrant on Chewbacca.
In 3 ABY, Darth Vader was unable to revoke the warrant issued against Payback, but was able to issue a reprieve.
